title: Madman
description: While trying to escape from the Soviet Union, a Soviet Jewish is locked in a mental institution, where he gets brutally tortured for several years. After his release, he's able to defect to Israel and gets the chance to join the Israeli army, even though he's not in good conditions to fight. His next plan is to seek revenge against the Russians but first he needs to go to another conflict in the Syrian border, far from where his enemies are. (Written by Rodrigo Amaro)
